info.title: Entities
info.description: The WebKnox entities API gives you access to millions of entities such as cities, actors, movies, cars, etc. You can search for entities and get factual information. Additionally, you may detect known entities from texts (often referred to as Named Entity Recognition).

get.description: Detect entity mentions in a given text.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text in which entities should be detected.

get.description: Find quotes from people about certain topics.

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: The author of the quote or empty if the author does not matter.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The text that must appear in the quote. Leave that empty if you want all quotes from the given author.
